name: Waiting (Nerb-Princess)
description:
A game made for The Quarantine Game Jam!
The theme is "A Lot Of" so I went for a lot of waiting.

Will you be able to wait long enough?

Music by: Luis Sayán 

Game and art by: Nerb-Princess

Made in Scratch.

How to play: 

You are a child like thing waiting for someone to come home. Interact with things by walking over them with the arrow keys to prevent boredom from setting in.
Certain items in the house boost  your fun levels, other items do nothing. If you wait long enough without succumbing to boredom you win.
Also stay away from the walls. I don't know how to fix getting stuck in them.

Note from the creator:

Play testing this was a pain since I had to play it through a couple times and I made it to be a cute thing you only play once for maybe a chuckle or two. The music is wonderful for such a little game and big thanks to Luis Sayán  for creating the charming little song for me. I hope the people who play this game enjoy it or at least get a laugh. Thanks so much for reading this and playing my game, bye.
